root.name: SD Gundam G Generation Portable
root.description: Featured SeriesThese are the series featured within SD Gundam G Generation Portable:Scenarios (Series which have playable missions)Mobile Suit Gundam (6 Stages) Mobile Suit Gundam: The 08th MS Team (2 Stages) Mobile Suit Gundam 0080: War in the Pocket (1 Stage) Mobile Suit Gundam 0083: Stardust Memory (4 Stages) Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam (6 Stages) Mobile Suit Gundam ZZ (4 Stages) Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack (2 Stages) Mobile Suit Gundam F91 (2 Stages) Mobile Suit Victory Gundam (5 Stages) Mobile Fighter G Gundam (5 Stages) New Mobile Report Gundam Wing (5 Stages) After War Gundam X (5 Stages) Turn A Gundam (6 Stages) Mobile Suit Gundam SEED (8 Stages) Mobile Suit Gundam SEED Destiny (9 Stages) Units (Series that contribute units. Scenario series are obviously included)MSV MS-X M-MSV Mobile Suit Gundam: Blue Destiny MS IGLOO Advance of Z Z-MSV Gundam Sentinel ZZ-MSV CCA-MSV Mobile Suit Gundam: Hathaway's Flash Mobile Suit Gundam F90 Mobile Suit Crossbone Gundam New Mobile Report Gundam Wing: Endless Waltz Mobile Suit Gundam SEED Astray Mobile Suit Gundam SEED X Astray G-Generation Originals
